text: Naoma is an unincorporated community in Raleigh County, West Virginia, United States. Naoma is located on West Virginia Route 3 south-southeast of Whitesville. Naoma has a post office with ZIP code 25140.ZIP Code Lookup The community was named after Naoma Pettry. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Raleigh County, West Virginia Category:Unincorporated communities in West Virginia
title: Naoma, West Virginia
